text: Eli Broad ( ; June 6, 1933April 30, 2021) was an American billionaire businessman and philanthropist. In June 2019, Forbes ranked Broad as the 233rd-wealthiest person in the world and the 78th-wealthiest person in the United States. He had a net worth of $6.7 billion.
